examples: Seduction is the fine art of manipulating people based on physical attraction and desire. Step 1: Be attractive. Step 2: Don't be unattractive.

definitions.definition: The felony of, as a man, inducing a previously chaste unmarried female to engage in sexual intercourse on a promise of marriage.
definitions.label_groups: dated , law , in English common law

definitions.definition: A seductive aspect of something; appeal .

secondary_definitions: ( dated , law , in English common law ) The felony of, as a man, inducing a previously chaste unmarried female to engage in sexual intercourse on a promise of marriage.
( usually in the plural ) A seductive aspect of something; appeal .
